sentences.english: I think that a luxury is nothing but an indulgence to showoff one's wealth.
sentences.chinese: 我想奢侈品只是用来彰显自己的财气罢了。

sentences.english: This is the opulence of the twin suites layout… a temple of your supreme status.
sentences.chinese: 豪华双套房设计，彰显豪迈气派，倍添矜贵身价。

sentences.english: It also facilitates your fitting and matching, while firefly purple highlights your extraordinary personality.
sentences.chinese: 萤紫色则彰显鲜明的个性情调。

sentences.english: Cheng Hao' ideal realm embodied the spirit of the philosophy of Cheng Hao.
sentences.chinese: “浑然与物同体”的境界充分彰显了程颢哲学的精神。

sentences.english: He longs for them to adjust their behaviour to reflect the righteousness of Jesus.
sentences.chinese: 他切望他们能够改正行为以彰显出耶稣的公义。

sentences.english: In someone's opinions, the keyboard becomes a medium of expression for the young writer's rebelliousness.
sentences.chinese: 在一些人看来，网络成了年轻写手彰显叛逆的媒介。

sentences.english: He discovereth deep things out of darkness, and bringeth out to light the shadow of death.
sentences.chinese: 他将深奥的事从黑暗中彰显，使死荫显为光明。

sentences.english: The calling for the spiritual growth reflects the deep thinking frow the author.
sentences.chinese: 对精神成长的深切呼唤，彰显出小说的思想深度。

sentences.english: The rapid development of science and technology reflects the status of Moism in the history of scientific culture.
sentences.chinese: 科学技术迅猛发展彰显了墨学在科学文化史上的地位。

sentences.english: Perfect combination of classic and modern, shiny leather highlights your dignity.
sentences.chinese: 经典与现代的结合，光泽感的皮料彰显尊贵。

sentences.english: Seated, the bronze table setting gives you a sense of palace grandeur.
sentences.chinese: 就座后，铜质的餐具彰显着宫殿般的富丽堂皇。

sentences.english: All these reveal the awkwardness of legal compliance and the sadness of scholarly lag of the reality.
sentences.chinese: 这一切彰显了有法不依的尴尬和学术滞后现实的悲哀。

sentences.english: The dust of history has been toward the Shikumen, this demonstrates a new vitality.
sentences.chinese: 本已走向历史烟尘的石库门，由此彰显了新的生命力。

sentences.english: However, the mansion alone honor, and not promote home ownership in the statue identity.
sentences.chinese: 然而，仅凭尊荣豪宅，亦无法彰显居者的尊显身份。

sentences.english: Meticulously service and the newest deluxe equipment show out the nobleness.
sentences.chinese: 无微不至管家式服务和最新的豪华设施彰显尊贵。

sentences.english: The era of multi-value, which reflects the subjectivity, demands the new approaches of moral education on teenagers.
sentences.chinese: 彰显主体性的价值多元时代呼唤青少年德育的新路向。

definition: conspicuous/to make sth stand out/make sth prominent
to present clearly/to give prominence to/to magnify/clear and obvious
to come out/to emerge/to reveal/to display
to come to prominence/to appear clearly/to stick out
to interpret/to comment and explain/to annotate/to perform (i.e. interpret a theatrical role)/to decode/interpretation/annotation
to reveal/to display/to show/to exhibit sth
to assign/to entrust (a task)/to give/to bestow
